jobDescription: Description: Business Data Analyst in Quincy, MA & other client sites in Boston metro area yet to be determined. Identify, integrate, & manage req’d internal/external resources to provide business solutions for complex business issues. Perform in-depth data analysis incl. building data-models & prototypes. Develop & present written project plans, execute test plan(s) & acceptance testing. Mail resume to John Hennessy, Whitridge Associates, Inc., 744 East Squantum Street, Quincy, MA 02171.
